remarks: Transfinite Induction Schema.  If all ordinal numbers less than a given number ` x ` have a property (induction hypothesis), then all ordinal numbers have the property (conclusion).  Exercise 25 of [Enderton] p. 200.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Nov-2016.)
statement:
tfis.1 $e |- ( x e. On -> ( A. y e. x [ y / x ] ph -> ph ) ) $.
tfis $p |- ( x e. On -> ph ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
